github_issues.schema: type GitHubIssue @queryable(key: "github_issues") { id: ID!, closed: Boolean!, number: Int!, repository: GithubRepository @relationship(matches: [{source: "repositoryId", target: "repositoryId"}]), repositoryId: String! @field(path:"@.repository.id"), title: String!, url: Url! } extend type GithubRepository { issues: [GitHubIssue] @relationship(matches: [{source: "repositoryId", target: "repositoryId"}], cascadeDelete: true)}
